name: Foucault's Cannon
text: A mechanized life form, roving through space-time. But the mysterious thing is that its memory i... m...stly gone. W...at is t...e reason? D..... refuse t... b.... interfered w...h?
pendulum_text: During the End Phase, if this card was activated this turn: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy it.
